alert.note: Alert for Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 6:59PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds from showers and thunderstorms will impact portions of central Tooele County through 745 PM MDT... At 658 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow winds from showers and thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Grantsville to 10 miles southeast of Utah Test and Training Range South. Movement was northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Utah Test and Training Range South, Delle, Knolls, Clive, Skull Valley and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 14 and 81. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
